model.PartitionGraph

Uses of PartitionGraph in algorithms.bisim
 

Methods in algorithms.bisim that return PartitionGraph
static PartitionGraph Bisimulation.computePartitions(model.interfaces.IGraph<MessageEvent> graph)
          Construct a partition graph from graph (by partitioning by label), call refine partitions on it, and return the refined graph.
static PartitionGraph Bisimulation.getMergedGraph(model.interfaces.IGraph<MessageEvent> graph)
          Construct a partition graph from graph (by partitioning by label), call mergePartitions on it, and return the refined graph.
static PartitionGraph Bisimulation.getRefinedGraph(model.interfaces.IGraph<MessageEvent> graph)
          Construct a partition graph from graph (by partitioning by label), call refinePartitions on it, and return the refined graph.
 

Methods in algorithms.bisim with parameters of type PartitionGraph
static void Bisimulation.kReduce(PartitionGraph partitionGraph, int k)
          Wrapper to mergePartitions without invariant preservation.
static void Bisimulation.mergePartitions(PartitionGraph partitionGraph)
          Works as mergePartitions but fixes invariants to partitionGraph.getInvariants()
static void Bisimulation.mergePartitions(PartitionGraph partitionGraph, TemporalInvariantSet invariants)
          Works as mergePartitions but fixes k to 0.
static void Bisimulation.mergePartitions(PartitionGraph partitionGraph, TemporalInvariantSet invariants, int k)
          Merge partitions if they are k equal, while maintaining invariants
static void Bisimulation.refinePartitions(PartitionGraph partitionGraph)
          Refines the partitions in partitionGraph until all invariants returned by partitionGraph.getInvariants() are satisfied.
